subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: This Part is applicable to every building in which glass reinforced plastics are manufactured or processed.

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: Premises for manufacture or processing of glass reinforced plastic mustâ€”

ol.li: provide for the safety and comfort or workers; and
be constructed in a manner that will avoid the spread of fire within the building and to other buildings.
